column4: Tesla starts taking orders for premium solar roofs
column5: Tesla Inc   on Wednesday began taking orders for its solar roof tiles  a cornerstone of Elon Musk's strategy to sell a fossil-fuel-free lifestyle under the brand name of its luxury electric vehicles.

column4: BRIEF-Intel says issued $700 mln aggregate principal amount of floating rate senior notes due 2020
column5: * Intel Corp says  on May 11  2017   issued $700 million aggregate principal amount of floating rate senior notes due 2020
